team-url-cannot-contain-consecutive-dash: Team URL cannot contain consecutive dashes or underscores.
team-url-cannot-start-or-end-with-dashes: Team URL cannot start or end with dashes or underscores.
team-url-must-be-at-least-3-characters-l: Team URL must be at least 3 characters long.
team-url-must-not-exceed-30-characters: Team URL must not exceed 30 characters.
